question:
Which of the following were present in the court of Harsha?
1. Banabhatta
2.Â  Mayura
3. Bhartrihari
4. Matanga Divakara
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Some of the accomplished writers in the court of Harsha were- (1) Banabhatta was the author of Harshacharita, (2) Mayura was the author of Mayurashatak, (3) Bhartrihari (grammarian), and Matanga Divakara.
